VICK NOT PARTYING: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as host of a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. Michael Vick spent 18 months in prison on federal charges of running a dogfighting ring.
